English .
NYU Abu Dhabi, Archives and Special Collections
NYU Abu Dhabi Student Life Events: Photos, Music, and Videos AD.RG.009.1.2.2
84.14 Gigabytes
Fall 2013 - Spring 2020 The NYU Abu Dhabi Student Life Events: Photos, Music, and Videos collection is a collection of digital images, as well as some music and video files, from a variety of student and campus events during Academic Years 2014 - 2020.
Biographical / Historical
Programs of NYU Abu Dhabi Student Life, part of the Division of Student Affairs (previously Campus Life), include a variety of events and activities arranged to cultivate engagement and inclusivity across the NYUAD campus. The Manager of Campus Facilities is part of a team of staff that advises on and arranges space and services to ensure events are successful. This includes photography and audiovisual arrangements.
Content Description
The NYU Abu Dhabi Student Life Events: Photos, Music, and Videos collection is a collection of digital images, as well as some music and video files, from a variety of student and campus events during Academic Years 2014 - 2020. The collection was maintained, organized and transferred to the University Archives by Student Affairs Facilities Manager, Declan Dowdall. Dowdall also transferred files he inherited from his predecessor, Alex Heald.
Events that are documented range from student field trips, to campus festivals, to other campus events such as Autism Awareness Week, Latino Night, Marhaba, Staff Appreciation Day, and Defend the Nest, among others.
A small file of administrative and program records from the desk of the Student Life Coordinator, Fall 2013-Spring 2015, were also transferred as part of this collection.
Arrangement
The collection has been minimally processed and its original arrangement by academic year has been retained.
Processing Information
The collection has been minimally processed.
Conditions Governing Access
This digital collection is accessible to members of the NYU Abu Dhabi community and the NYU Global Network. It is available for viewing in the Archives and Special Collections reading room, or remotely by request.
Conditions Governing Use
Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) are maintained by New York University Abu Dhabi Corporation. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured. Please contact NYU Abu Dhabi Public Affairs and Communications.
Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
Audiovisual material is born-digital and available for viewing on a computer workstation in the Archives and Special Collections Reading Room, facilitated by ASC staff. Student Life Event Coordinator34.7 MegabytesFall 2013 - Spring 2015
Scope and Contents
Mixed program and administrative files. Includes these subfolders:
Brochure, Budget, FileRelease, Flavors of Abu Dhabi, Forms, Linajma, Ma_a Salama, Ma_a Salama 2015, Marhaba 2013, Marhaba 2014, Newsletter, NYUAD Brand Pack, Saadiyat, Student Info.AY13-14 (Alex Heald)429.7 MegabytesFall 2013 - Spring 2014
Scope and Contents
Images and documents maintained by the Manager of Student Life Facilities, Alex Heald, from the period 2013-2014. Includes the following subfolders:
Ajman Kashtah, AustraliaNZ, Autism Event, Breakthrough, Class of 2014, Dubai Kashtah, Fujairah Camping, GIN 2014, HULT, Latino Night, Linajma, Mangroves, National Day, Old Photos, Random, Sama Cup Outreach, Saudi VIP, Taste From Home Malaysian, and USA Canada Night.
Conditions Governing Use
During this era, students were not yet routinely signing authorization release forms for being photographed at events, thus images from this series may not be used or reproduced without permission from NYU Abu Dhabi External Affairs and Communications.Ajman Kashtah136 MegabytesAustraliaNZ51.2 MegabytesAY14-15 (Alex Heald)1.67 GigabytesFall 2014 - Spring 2015
Scope and Contents
Includes images from a variety of events and field trips, maintained by Student Life Facilities Manager Alex Heald. Includes the following subfolders:
Al Wathba Camel Races, As One Screening, Autism Awareness Lunch, Class of 2015 Photos, Community Outreach Fair, Debate, Della Mae Bluegrass, Diplomacy in Action, Dubomedy March 2015, East Asia Night, Falcon_s Flood, Flavors - Russian Kitchen, FYD Service Weekend, Terry Fox Run.
Conditions Governing Use
During this era, students were not yet routinely signing authorization release forms for being photographed at events, thus images from this series may not be used or reproduced without permission from NYU Abu Dhabi External Affairs and Communications.AY14-15 (Declan Dowdall)483.6 MegabytesFall 2014 - Spring 2015
Scope and Contents
Images and audio files from academic year 2014-2015, maintained by Student Affairs Facilities Manager, Declan Dowdall. Includes the following subfolders:
AY15 Dubomedy March 2015, AY15 Latino Night 2015, AY15 National Day 43 Event, AY15 Saadiyat After Hours Event Calender.AY15-16 (Declan Dowdall)3.83 GigabytesFall 2015 - Spring 2016
